info_guitar_must_be_in_focus: You can play the guitar with your mouse and keyboard. Guitar panel must be in focus (blue border around it) for using keyboard. If you click on any object except guitar, you lose focus and can't use keyboard anymore. For return to guitar panel you have to click on it or press

quit: Are you sure you want to quit?
